title: HubSpot projects $2.99B revenue and 18% margin for 2025, driven by AI adoption

text: Earnings Call Insights: HubSpot (NYSE:HUBS) Q4 2024 Management View CEO Yamini Rangan highlighted a solid finish to 2024, with Q4 revenue growing 20% year-over-year in constant currency. Earnings Call Insights: HubSpot (NYSE:HUBS) Q4 2024

Management View

  • CEO Yamini Rangan highlighted a solid finish to 2024, with Q4 revenue growing 20% year-over-year in constant currency. The customer base expanded to 248,000, with over 9,800 net additions in the quarter. Operating margin reached 19%, reflecting
